name: ICScannerDevice
desc: An object that represents a scanner.

items.name: var availableFunctionalUnitTypes: [NSNumber]
items.desc: An array of functional unit types available on this scanner.

items.name: var selectedFunctionalUnit: ICScannerFunctionalUnit
items.desc: The currently selected functional unit on the scanner.

items.name: func requestSelect(ICScannerFunctionalUnitType)
items.desc: Requests to select a functional unit on the scanner.

items.name: enum ICScannerFunctionalUnitType
items.desc: The types of scanner functional units.

items.name: enum ICScannerFunctionalUnitState
items.desc: Flags to indicate the state of the scanner functional unit.

items.name: func requestOpenSession(withCredentials: String, password: String)
items.desc: Opens a session on the protected device with the authorized username and passcode.

items.name: func requestOverviewScan()
items.desc: Starts an overview scan on the selected functional unit.

items.name: func requestScan()
items.desc: Starts a scan on the selected functional unit.

items.name: var transferMode: ICScannerTransferMode
items.desc: The transfer mode for the scanned document.

items.name: var maxMemoryBandSize: UInt32
items.desc: The total maximum band size requested when performing a memory-based transfer.

items.name: var defaultUsername: String
items.desc: A default username on protected scanners.
